qas.question: youtube is completely what in some places?
Why besides limited periods of time would youtube not be allowed in a country?
What might happen in a restrictive state even if you do have access to the youtube site itself?

plausible_answers.text: during periods of unrest, the run-up to an election, or in response to upcoming political anniversaries

qas.question: Why was YouTube completely blocked in all countries?

plausible_answers.text: agree to remove or limit access to that video in order to restore service.

qas.question: What does YouTube do when a video is banned in all countries?

plausible_answers.text: will often agree to remove or limit access to that video in order to restore service.

qas.question: What does YouTube do when the entire is site is blocked in all countries because of one video?

context: In some countries, YouTube is completely <a0_0>blocked<a0_0/>, either through a <a1_0>long term standing ban<a1_0/> or for more limited periods of time such as <b3_0>during periods of unrest, the run-up to an election, or in response to upcoming political anniversaries<b3_0/>. In other countries access to the website as a whole remains open, but access to <a2_0>specific videos is blocked<a2_0/>. In cases where the entire site is banned due to one particular video, YouTube <b5_0>will often <b4_0>agree to remove or limit access to that video in order to restore service.
